trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeightInfoNeeded"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the row the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på rad hendelsen oppstod for.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is greater than 65,536.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er større enn 65 536.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum height of the row the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimumshøyden for raden hendelsen oppstod for.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is less than 2.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er mindre enn 2.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeightInfoNeededEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen i raden som er tilknyttet denne <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeightInfoNeededEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden hendelsen oppstod for.
